mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNo, b.title, u.name as userName, b.cnt, b.regdate, b.userNo, b.content FROM board b , users u where b.boardNo = #{boardNo} and b.userNo = u.no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardNo, title, content, regdate, userNo) SELECT board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, u.no FROM users u WHERE u.no = #{userNo}
mapper.update: update board set cnt = cnt + 1 where boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) FROM board b, users u where b.userno = u.no
